first_para: William Thomas Bain (born 29 November 1972) is a Scottish Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Glasgow North East since 2009.

full.extract:
William Thomas Bain (born 29 November 1972) is a Scottish Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Glasgow North East since 2009.
On 7 October 2011, Bain was appointed as Shadow Scotland Office Minister, supporting the Shadow Scottish Secretary Margaret Curran.
^ "William Bain MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ Cabinet reshuffle: Miliband promotes Curran to Scotland job
full.title: Willie Bain
